markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vanth's Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2357) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 30 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You seek to emulate [vanth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=769) reapers' fighting styles. You are trained with [bo staves](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [longbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76), [composite longbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74), [scythes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39), and [staves](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12).

<title level="2">Vanth's Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Vanth's Weapon Execution](/Feats.aspx?ID=2360), [Vanth's Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2364)
name: Vanth's Weapon Familiarity
